div.p: Group 1 Mapping from ParticipationStatus to ParticipationStatus

tr.td: Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/appointmentresponse-status|5.0.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.3.0` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/5.0/ConceptMap/R5-AppointmentresponseStatus-R4B-Participationstatus` (`ConceptMap-R5-AppointmentresponseStatus-R4B-Participationstatus.json`) Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.3.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.0.1` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/4.3/ConceptMap/R4B-Participationstatus-R4-Participationstatus` (`ConceptMap-R4B-Participationstatus-R4-Participationstatus.json`)

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for ValueSet R5-appointmentresponse-status-for-R4-participationstatus from FHIR R5 to FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of concepts from ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/appointmentresponse-status|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.

comment.value: Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/appointmentresponse-status|5.0.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.3.0` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/5.0/ConceptMap/R5-AppointmentresponseStatus-R4B-Participationstatus` (`ConceptMap-R5-AppointmentresponseStatus-R4B-Participationstatus.json`) Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.3.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.0.1` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/4.3/ConceptMap/R4B-Participationstatus-R4-Participationstatus` (`ConceptMap-R4B-Participationstatus-R4-Participationstatus.json`)
